title: Womens Dress Boat Neck
title_original: Ckikiou Womens Lightweight Oversized Boat Neck Sweaters Tops Dolman Batwing Sleeve Ribbed Knitted Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and flattering on different body types, with one mentioning it can hide belly fat.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful oversize sweater
items.body: The purple oversize sweatwer is soft, light weight and feels cozy while giving you a classy look. I love it! The sweater will look flattering on anyone size extra small to large (US size 0 to 12). For anyone over size 12, it will be tighter in the stomach area and loose its glamure. I wash it on delicate cycle and lay it flat to dry, which is inconvenient, but worth it for me to keep it for longer. Read more
items.author: Ana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and soft for the price
items.body: Super cute! Surprised on how stylish you can make it. Push up the sleeves, drop it off of the shoulder. Little front tuck. Adorable! I weigh 120 pounds most of it I carry in my back area. Has a definite oversized feel. Dog hair doesn’t stick to it yet. I ordered the yellow. It’s a nice muted color. Almost gold. Read more
items.author: Sharon Nelson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater
items.body: Looks pretty and well made just wish it was slightly bigger for what I wanted to wear it with. Very soft and nice color. The front of the neck tends to ride up too close to my chin for my liking. Which is why I usually buy oversized boat neck sweaters so that doesn't happen. It is roomy don't get me wrong. Just the neck thing for me. Read more
items.author: SA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes it fits and it’s versatile!
items.body: I’m plus size and this sweater is one size fits all. The material is quality, yet lightweight. The boat neck is not too wide where my bra shows. It is so comfortable. Some say they noticed a smell, I did not sense any foul odor. I plan to buy more of these. Can go with dress pants, jeans, skirts, it’s multi use. Good sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater LOVE!
items.body: I purchased this sweater (2) in khaki and army green and I knew, when I pulled them from the bags, that I liked them. 'Like' turned to 'love' when I tried them on. I'm 5'3" and weigh 148 lbs. and the sweaters drape perfectly. Pulling them up at the bottom to your waist gives the illusion of a smaller waistline (yeah!). And if your body temp runs high like mine, you'll appreciate the dolman/batwing sleeves and the fact that this garment is not heavy but so soft and comfy. I'm looking forward to cooler weather and wearing them with skirts or pants or jeans...dressed up or down. I'm also looking forward to my next order with 2 more (Pink1 and Black) and hoping the sizing, quality, fit is identical to my first order. Note: No pics yet since I need to steam a few wrinkles way. Happy Shopping! Read more
items.author: PhotoKismet

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Definitely oversized
items.body: I purchased the kahki color, color is true to picture. I usually wear a size large or XL in tops and this is very roomy on me. It is very soft and comfortable. My only complaint is the neckline, the slit is an odd opening length and makes the front droop a bit, very baggy look. Material is thinner but not see through. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came used
items.body: I ordered 3 different colors. The other two had tags in original packaging. This one was used. This is an Amazon issue, no one else’s. Love the fabric, very soft I’m going to wash on delicate and won’t put in dryer to see if it won’t pill. It’s not too thin like others have said. I live in the south so it will work out well for our “ winter” months. I’m not wide in the hips so the waist isn’t an issue as it could be for larger size women- just reading reviews. It isn’t crazy tight in the bottom at all, it has give. It can be worn dressy with the right jewelry or casual. Looking forward to wearing them. I hope the way I’m going to care for them will have them hold up over time. Read more
items.author: mannefitz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: It fits well. Has a classy and conservative look. Read more
items.author: Rosaline Rovang

short_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-stripe-red, Pink-1, White+black, Green+black, Black, Grey+black, Red+black, A-rose Red, Beige, A-pumpkin, Blue-2, White-2, Caramel-2, 1-stripe-caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
